attributes.action: Increase the discount from 25% to 50% off the council tax for lone home owners
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why do single people only get 25% off their council tax.  Why not 50% - it makes more sense if we are not at home all the time.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Increase the discount from 25% to 50% off the council tax for lone home owners."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11006.asp

Prime Minister's Office
